message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $13,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is considerably higher. I could consider letting it go for $11,500.
Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
